articles.title: US presidential race 2024: Hirsh Vardhan Singh is third Indian-American Republican to announce White House... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: After Nikki Haley and Vivek Ramaswamy, Singh, who says his Democrat rivals call him 'Trump on steroids',  is set to go toe- to-toe with Donald Trump for Republican nomination. For all his legal troubles, Trump is way ahead of the pack
articles.content: Hirsh Vardhan Singh, a 38-year-old Indian-American engineer, has announced his bid to secure the Republican nomination for the 2024 presidential election, the third person of Indian descent set to go… [+2788 chars]

articles.author: Cristian Santana, Emma Li, Julia Jester, Dennis Romero
articles.title: An American woman and her child have been kidnapped in Haiti, organization says - NBC News
articles.description: A nurse and her child, both Americans, have been kidnapped amid crime and unrest in Haiti's capital, a nonprofit connected to the woman said Saturday.
articles.content:
A nurse and her child, both Americans, have been kidnapped amid crime and unrest in Haiti's capital, a nonprofit connected to the woman said Saturday.
The group, El Roi Haiti, said in a statement th… [+3058 chars]
